longDesc: A monstrous wyvern slowly circles just above your head.
detailedDesc: This huge winged creature looks really menacing as it circles only inches This huge winged creature looks really menacing as it circles only inches above your head, flapping its wings and squawking very loudly.

longDesc: A mountain goblin is wandering around mumbling to himself...
detailedDesc: You see before you a small and twisted creature with knotted muscles and You see before you a small and twisted creature with knotted muscles and disgustingly green skin.  Doesn't look like the type you'd invite to dinner.

longDesc: A goblin lieutenant stands here, attempting to get his men in order.
detailedDesc: The goblin lieutenant is rather angry, and looking for one of his men to The goblin lieutenant is rather angry, and looking for one of his men to beat up upon, but maybe you will do just fine...

longDesc: The goblin leader surveys the room.
detailedDesc: The leader doesn't look too happy that you have found him here.  He grabs The leader doesn't look too happy that you have found him here.  He grabs for his shortsword and lunges for your neck.

longDesc: A small boy sits here, licking his wounds.
detailedDesc: The poor boy has numerous cuts and scratches, but appears to be all right. The poor boy has numerous cuts and scratches, but appears to be all right. He is apparently the only survivor of the ambush.

longDesc: The Innkeeper stands here, cleaning glasses.
detailedDesc: The Innkeeper now spends most of his days waiting for customers, while the The Innkeeper now spends most of his days waiting for customers, while the nights are spent watching out for goblins.  His inn is no longer the happy place that is used to be in days past.

longDesc: A sullen bard is here, drinking away his problems.
detailedDesc: You can smell the alcohol on his breath from across the room.  This poor You can smell the alcohol on his breath from across the room.  This poor bard has been sitting here quite a while, drinking himself into oblivion.

longDesc: A dark horseman is here, mounted on his black steed.
detailedDesc: The man is obviously an outlaw, and has no qualms about slashing you into The man is obviously an outlaw, and has no qualms about slashing you into little bits.
